Package main.java

Class SimilarityAnalysis

java.lang.Object
main.java.SimilarityAnalysis
public class SimilarityAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
The class contains the methods in order to run a similarity analysis between authors.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.ArrayList<AffinityMap> deltas  
    private FreqMap freqMap

  • Constructor Details

    • SimilarityAnalysis

      public SimilarityAnalysis​(FreqMap known)
      Generates an instance, using a FreqMap of known authors.
      Parameters:
      known - the FreqMap instance with the known author's data.

  • Method Details

    • exec

      private void exec()
      Runs the analysis. For each couple of known/unknwown author generates an AffinityMap instance. The analysis runs in two phases:
      • Calculates the deltas for each couple of authors;
      • Sorts the AffintiyMap instances in order to have the most similar and the less similar in order.

    • toFile

      public void toFile​(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path outputPath) throws java.io.IOException
      Writes the current SimilarityAnalysis to an output file.
      Parameters:
      fs - the filesystem where the file is written.
      outputPath - the path where the file is about to be saved.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an IOException writing the file occurs.

    • computedDelta

      private AffinityMap computedDelta​(FreqMapEntry kn, FreqMapEntry unk)
      Calculates the deltas between the frequency map of a known and an unknown author. The operation performed is the absolute value of the difference between respective field names of the two maps.
      Parameters:
      kn - the known author frequency map.
      unk - the unknown frequency map.
      Returns:
      an AffinityMap instance containing the comparison result.
